name: BuMazebble
description:
This game was created with AppGameKit Studio to participatein "The AMAZING AppGameKit Game Jam".

You are a Bubble, and you are going through a maze to reach a goal block.

The goal block is a block that blinks in a different pattern than the surrounding blocks.

If you manipulate the bubble well, you can get through the walls, but if you fail, you may lose your character.

If you lose your character or get lost, reset the game and try again.

How many seconds will it take you to reach the goal?
